title: The Chosen of Shar

When the room is completely shrouded in darkness, you'll see the pattern on the floor. Use only one character to crouch-walk and avoid the glowing lines. This lets you touch the orb to unlock the doorway.

In order to complete the Gauntlet of Shar, you need to collect 4 Umbral Gems and reach the inner Sanctum.
